text: Hi all, any idea how to setup the site search so it works properly on a multilingual site? IE: if on the UK site it only searches UK pages etc.

Hi <@UHJM7AW02> :wave:
Are you using Google Custom Search? If yes, I think you can set up specific parameters to search by language: <https://developers.google.com/custom-search/v1/site_restricted_api> << There’s a link on that page which will take you to the parameters available, one of which is language.
If that’s not it, would you mind sharing a bit more info on the site you’re wanting to set this up for? Like is it a fully-hosted HubSpot site (if not, what CMS is it using), is it using TLDs, subdomains, or subdirectories for languages… If you can share an example URL, that could help.
If it’s a HubSpot search module, you can use the `&language` parameter as listed here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content>
